shortdesc.ph: Gets the maximum zoom factor supported by the camera.
Gets the maximum zoom factor supported by the camera.
Gets the maximum zoom factor supported by the camera.

ul.li: This method must be called after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LocalVideoStreamStateCapturing (1).
This method is only applicable to Android and iOS.
Call this method after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as localVideoStreamStateCapturing (1).
This method is for Android and iOS only.
You must call this method after the SDK triggers the callback and the local video state is LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1).

section.title: Return Values
section.p: The maximum zoom factor supported by the device camera.
The maximum zoom factor supported by the device camera.
The maximum zoom factor supported by the device camera.
